success_criteria: Linter passes with zero errors; All unit tests pass; Code coverage does not decrease.
failure_action: Block commit (pre-commit hook) or fail CI build.
business_impact: Prevents simple bugs and style issues from entering the codebase.

success_criteria: On-Commit Gate passes; Unit test coverage > 85% (95% for Auth); All integration tests pass; No new 'High' or 'Critical' vulnerabilities from SAST/SCA scans.
tools_used: GitHub Actions, Jest, Supertest, SonarQube, Snyk, CodeQL
escalation_procedure: PR review comments; Discussion with Tech Lead.
business_impact: Prevents integration issues and security vulnerabilities from reaching the main branch.

success_criteria: Automated smoke test suite passes (covers login, registration, post creation); Critical path E2E tests pass.
failure_action: Trigger an alert to the on-call engineer; Halt promotion to Production.
escalation_procedure: Automatic PagerDuty alert; Incident response process.
business_impact: Catches critical regressions in a production-like environment before they impact users.

success_criteria: Automated load tests meet NFRs (P95 < 200ms); Manual exploratory testing completed; UAT sign-off from Product Owner; No outstanding critical bugs.
business_impact: Final check to ensure release quality meets business and user expectations.
